name: DhiWise UI Kit
description:
This UI kit is recommend for building apps via DhiWise!


Why the need for this UI kit?


For DhiWise’s Mobile technologies to deliver you the highest accuracy of design-to-code conversion, your app design needs to follow standard industry level design guidelines.


However, for that your design needs to be made with care and precision. Because the fewer corrections to make on the Dhiwise platform, the quicker you will generate your code!


The outcome of using this UI kit


After using this UI kit, when it’s time for design-to-code conversion the accuracy will increase leading to less correction and faster speed in your app development lifecycle on DhiWise.


In case of any query write to us at help@dhiwise.com.
